Undergraduates Pre-Registration for Fall 2023


 
Notice to Students in The College for Pre-Registration for Fall 2023

Graduate students Pre-Registration for Fall 2023

Important Graduation Related Deadlines



****ATTENTION GRADUATING SENIORS****
Important Spring 2023 Graduation Related Deadlines
Read more.


 



Academic Calendar



Current
2023-2024



Summer 2022


April


4 Mon Apr 
until 14 Thu Apr



Registration for Summer courses for continuing Brown undergraduates opens at 9:00 a.m.EDT on Monday April 4 and continues through Thursday April 14 at 5:00 p.m. EDT





19 Tue Apr 
until 26 Tue Apr



Registration period for fall courses for Brown undergraduates. Summer registration closed during this period.





27 Wed Apr 
until 22 Wed Jun



Registration period for Summer courses for Brown undergraduates re-opens at 9:00 a.m.EDT and remains open until Wednesday June 22 at 5:00 p.m. EDT










June


31 Tue May 
until 22 Wed Jun



Registration period for Summer courses for Brown undergraduates re-opens at 9:00 a.m.EDT and remains open until Wednesday June 22 at 5:00 p.m. EDT





19 Sun Jun 




Residence halls open.





20 Mon Jun 




Juneteenth Holiday observed.  No University exercises.





21 Tue Jun 




Summer Session classes begin.





22 Wed Jun 




Last day to change courses (5:00 p.m. EDT deadline). (All students MUST be in their registered courses by Thursday, June 23.)










July


4 Mon Jul 




Independence Day holiday. No University exercises.





6 Wed Jul 




Last day to change grade options (5:00 p.m. EDT deadline)





29 Fri Jul 




Classes end.





30 Sat Jul 
until 2 Tue Aug



Reading Period










August


31 Sun Jul 
until 2 Tue Aug



Reading Period





2 Tue Aug 




Last day to drop a course (5:00 p.m. EDT deadline). Last day to initiate a Course Performance Report via ASK.





3 Wed Aug 
until 5 Fri Aug



Final examination period.





5 Fri Aug 




Summer Session ends.





6 Sat Aug 




Residence halls close.








Fall 2022


August


1 Mon Aug 




Last day for payment of charges.





30 Tue Aug 




Beginning of Graduate School All-Student Orientation.










September


1 Thu Sep 




Beginning of College Orientation.





2 Fri Sep 
until 5 Mon Sep



Registration of new undergraduate and all graduate students students for the fall semester begins at 4:00 pm EDT Friday and ends at 11:59 pm EDT Monday Sept 5. (Maximum of 4 credit hours allowed for undergraduates).





6 Tue Sep 




Registration re-opens at 9:00 am EDT on Sept 6 for all students for the fall semester. (Up to a maximum of 5 credit hours allowed).





7 Wed Sep 




First day of RISD Fall Session.





7 Wed Sep 




Classes of the first semester begin.





9 Fri Sep 




Theses/Dissertations of candidates for Masters and Ph.D. degrees in October due.





10 Sat Sep 




Opening Convocation at 10:00 a.m.EDT





14 Wed Sep 




Last day to register for a Fall RISD course without a fee or change a grade option for a Fall RISD course - (5:00 p.m. EDT deadline).





20 Tue Sep 




Last day to add a course without a fee (5:00 p.m. EDT deadline). Banner Web will be taken down for approximately one hour. Once relaunched, all course adds require Instructor override and will be charged a late fee of $15 per course.










October


1 Sat Oct 




Deadline for undergraduates on personal leave (including employment and military leave) or on Full-time Study Away status to request return to studies at Brown for Spring.





4 Tue Oct 




Last day to add a course (includes late fee), change from audit to credit, or change a grade option declaration (5:00 p.m. EDT deadline).





10 Mon Oct 




Indigenous Peoples’ Day. No University exercises.





11 Tue Oct 




Last day to receive any partial tuition refund.





14 Fri Oct 




Last day to change from credit to audit in a course (5:00 p.m. EDT deadline).





15 Sat Oct 




Mid-semester.





18 Tue Oct 




Date by which sophomores entering their 5th semester must file their concentration declaration forms via ASK to avoid having a “No Concentration” hold placed against their Banner registration. (5:00 p.m. EDT deadline).





24 Mon Oct 




Advising period for spring pre-registration begins. Students in their first through third semesters will need to procure their advising PIN from their advisor in order to register.










November


3 Thu Nov 




Date by which advisors must approve sophomore submitted concentrations in ASK to avoid having a “No Concentration” hold placed against the student’s Banner registration. (5:00 p.m. EDT deadline).





7 Mon Nov 




Registration opens for Semester II, 2022-23 for undergraduate students semester level 07 and above and all continuing graduate students (except Online - MPH) at noon EST. Registration will close from midnight Tuesday Nov 8 until midnight Wednesday Nov 9 t





8 Tue Nov 




United States Election Day. No University exercises.





9 Wed Nov 




Registration opens for Semester II, 2022-23 for undergraduate students semester levels 05-06 at noon EST. (Students are unable to register for 5th semester unless approved concentration is filed). Registration remains open until Tuesday, November 15, 5:00





10 Thu Nov 




Registration opens for Semester II, 2022-23 for undergraduate students semester levels 03-04 at noon EST. Registration remains open until Tuesday, November 15, 5:00 p.m. EST. (Maximum of 4 credit hours allowed for undergraduates).





11 Fri Nov 




Registration opens for Semester II, 2022-23 for undergraduate students semester levels 01-02 at noon EST. Registration remains open until Tuesday, November 15, 5:00 p.m. EST. (Maximum of 4 credit hours allowed for undergraduates).





11 Fri Nov 




Deadline for submission of proposals for College Curriculum Council-approved undergraduate group study projects (GISPs), independent study projects, and internships for credit)for Semester II.





12 Sat Nov 
until 15 Tue Nov



Registration for Semester II, 2022-23 continues until Tuesday, November 15, 5:00 p.m. EST.





14 Mon Nov 




Students on serious warning who wish to drop a course after this date must meet with an academic dean for advising and to obtain a “drop code.”





23 Wed Nov 
until 27 Sun Nov



Thanksgiving recess beginning Wednesday at noon EST.





28 Mon Nov 




Classes resume.





30 Wed Nov 




Registration opens for Semester II 2022-23 for Online - MPH students at 9:00 a.m. EST.










December


30 Wed Nov 




Registration opens for Semester II 2022-23 for Online - MPH students at 9:00 a.m. EST.





1 Thu Dec 




Deadline for undergraduates to request a personal leave (including employment and military leave) or to request  Full-time Study Away status for Spring.  Any Full-time Study Away approved by the Study Away Review Committee for which the Registrar does not





3 Sat Dec 




Midyear Completion Celebration at 4:00 p.m. EST in Salomon De Ciccio Family Auditorium.





5 Mon Dec 




Last day of Fall RISD classes.





8 Thu Dec 




Beginning of Reading Period (optional and at the discretion of the instructor).





12 Mon Dec 




Last day to initiate a Course Performance Report via ASK.





12 Mon Dec 




UG CERTIFICATES: Last day for students in their ante-penultimate (typically 6th) semester to declare an undergraduate certificate in ASK.





12 Mon Dec 




UG CONCENTRATIONS: Last day for students to declare second or third concentrations in ASK for students in their penultimate semester (typically the 7th semester) who are declaring a second/third concentration (5:00 p.m. EST deadline).





12 Mon Dec 




Classes end for courses not observing the Reading Period. Last day to drop a course (5:00 p.m. EST deadline) or to request an incomplete from an instructor.





13 Tue Dec 




Last day for approved 7th (or penultimate) semester undergraduates in eligible concentrations to submit writing completed in the concentration in ASK to complete part II of the writing requirement. Concentration advisors must approve submitted writing in 





13 Tue Dec 
until 21 Wed Dec



Final Examination Period (inclusive of Sunday).








Winter 2023


November


17 Thu Nov 
until 5 Mon Dec



Registration for Winter Session courses (begins at 9:00 A.M. EST)










December


30 Wed Nov 
until 5 Mon Dec



Registration for Winter Session courses (begins at 9:00 A.M. EST)





5 Mon Dec 




Last day to register for a Winter Session course (5:00 p.m. EST deadline).





14 Wed Dec 




Winter Session tuition due.





22 Thu Dec 




Winter Session courses begin.










January


10 Tue Jan 




Last day to change a grade option declaration.





16 Mon Jan 




Martin Luther King, Jr. holiday. No University exercises.





17 Tue Jan 




Last day to drop a course or request an incomplete from an instructor. Last day to initiate a Course Performance Report via ASK.





24 Tue Jan 




Final examinations. Winter Session ends.








Spring 2023


January


1 Sun Jan 




Last day for payment of charges.





5 Thu Jan 




First day of RISD Winter Session.





12 Thu Jan 




Last day to register for a Winter RISD course without a fee or change a grade option for a Winter RISD course (5:00 p.m. EST deadline).





13 Fri Jan 




Theses/Dissertations of candidates for Masters and Ph.D. degrees in February due.





16 Mon Jan 




Martin Luther King, Jr. holiday. No University exercises.





24 Tue Jan 




Registration of new students (except Online - MPH) for the second semester (4:00 p.m. EST to midnight).





25 Wed Jan 




Classes of the second semester begin. Web registration begins at 8:00 a.m. EST










February


7 Tue Feb 




Last day to add a course without a fee (5:00 p.m. EST deadline). Banner Web will be taken down for approximately one hour. Once relaunched, all course adds require Instructor override and will be charged a late fee of $15 per course.





8 Wed Feb 




Last day of Winter RISD classes.





16 Thu Feb 




First day of RISD Spring Session.





18 Sat Feb 
until 21 Tue Feb



Long weekend. No University exercises.





22 Wed Feb 




Classes resume. Last day to add a course (includes late fee), change from audit to credit, or change a grade option declaration (5:00 p.m. EST deadline).





23 Thu Feb 




Last day to register for a Spring RISD course without a fee or change a grade option for a Spring RISD course (5:00 p.m. EST deadline).





28 Tue Feb 




Last day to receive any partial tuition refund.










March


28 Tue Feb 




Last day to receive any partial tuition refund.





10 Fri Mar 




Seniors - Last day to have concentration revisions approved in ASK (if required by department) for existing concentration programs (5:00 p.m. EST deadline).





10 Fri Mar 




Last day to change from credit to audit in a course (5:00 p.m. EST deadline).





11 Sat Mar 




Mid-semester.





15 Wed Mar 




Seniors - Date by which graduating students with more than one concentration or one of a few, specific interdepartmental concentrations on their record to change/select the departmental ceremony they wish to attend at Commencement (5:00 p.m. EST deadline)





20 Mon Mar 




Date by which sophomores entering their 5th semester must file their concentration declaration forms via ASK to avoid having a “No Concentration” hold placed against their Banner registration. (5:00 p.m. EDT deadline).





25 Sat Mar 
until 2 Sun Apr



Spring Recess










April


31 Fri Mar 
until 2 Sun Apr



Spring Recess





1 Sat Apr 




Deadline for undergraduates on personal leave (including employment and military leave) or on Full-time Study Away status to request return to studies at Brown for Fall.





3 Mon Apr 




Advising period for fall pre-registration begins. Students in their first through third semesters will need to procure their advising PIN from their advisor in order to register.





3 Mon Apr 




Classes resume.





3 Mon Apr 




Mandatory for all Seniors - Last day for Undergraduate students to apply to graduate in Banner Web via Banner Web’s Application to Graduate (Note: This is a required step for all students planning to graduate)





11 Tue Apr 




Students on serious warning who wish to drop a course after this date must meet with an academic dean for advising and to obtain a “drop code.”





14 Fri Apr 




Deadline for submission of proposals for College Curriculum Council-approved undergraduate group study projects (GISPs), independent study projects, and internships for credit)for Semester I.





18 Tue Apr 




Registration opens for Semester I, 2023-24 for undergraduate students semester level 07 and above and all continuing graduate students (except Online - MPH) at noon EDT. Registration remains open until Tuesday, April 25, 5:00 p.m. EDT. (Maximum of 4 credi





19 Wed Apr 




Registration opens for Semester I, 2023-24 for undergraduate students semester level 05-06 at noon EDT. (Students are unable to register for 5th semester unless approved concentration is filed). Registration remains open until Tuesday, April 25, 5:00 p.m.





20 Thu Apr 




Registration opens for Semester I, 2023-24 for continuing undergraduate students semester levels 04 and below at noon EDT. Registration remains open until Tuesday, April 25, 5:00 p.m. EDT. (Maximum of 4 credit hours allowed for undergraduates).





21 Fri Apr 




Mandatory for all Graduate and Medical students - Last day to apply to graduate in Banner Web via Banner Web’s Application to Graduate (Note: This is a required step for all students planning to graduate).





21 Fri Apr 
until 25 Tue Apr



Registration for Semester I, 2023-24 continues until Tuesday, April 25 5:00 p.m. EDT.





28 Fri Apr 




Reading Period begins and will end on May 10 (optional and at the discretion of the instructor).










May


1 Mon May 




Theses of candidates for Masters and Ph.D. degrees in May due.





1 Mon May 




Deadline for undergraduates to request a personal leave (including employment and military leave) or to request Full-time Study Away status for Fall. Any Full-time Study Away approved by the Study Away Review Committee for which the Registrar does not rec





5 Fri May 




Seniors: Honors Recommendations from academic departments due to the Office of the Registrar. Please have your work in your committee’s hands well before this date in accordance with their guidelines (5:00 p.m. EDT deadline).





9 Tue May 




Last day to initiate a Course Performance Report via ASK.





9 Tue May 




Classes end for courses not observing the Reading Period. Last day to drop a course (5:00 p.m. EDT deadline) or to request an incomplete from an instructor.





9 Tue May 




Reading Period ends.





9 Tue May 




UG CERTIFICATES: Last day for students in their ante-penultimate (typically 6th) semester to declare an undergraduate certificate in ASK.





9 Tue May 




UG CONCENTRATIONS: Last day for students to declare second or third concentrations in ASK for students in their penultimate semester (typically the 7th semester) who are declaring a second/third concentration (5:00 p.m. EDT deadline).





10 Wed May 




Last day for approved 7th (or penultimate) semester undergraduates in eligible concentrations to submit writing completed in the concentration in ASK to complete part II of the writing requirement. Concentration advisors must approve submitted writing in 





10 Wed May 
until 19 Fri May



Final Examination Period (No exams on Sunday May 14)





12 Fri May 




Seniors: Last day for prior-term incomplete coursework to be submitted to faculty (5:00 p.m. EDT deadline).





12 Fri May 




Seniors:Last day to have prior-term transfer courses into Brown (ASK approvals and transcripts) and prior-term abroad transcripts to OIP (5:00 p.m. EDT deadline).





17 Wed May 




Last day of Spring RISD classes.





19 Fri May 




Seniors: Last day for student loan borrowers to complete mandatory online loan exit counseling requirements. View your requirements on Banner Self Service or contact the Loan Office for assistance  (5:00 p.m. EDT deadline).





19 Fri May 




Seniors: Last day to have current-term transfer courses into Brown (ASK approvals and transcripts) and current-term abroad transcripts to OIP (5:00 p.m. EDT deadline).





19 Fri May 




Seniors: Last day to have grades for prior-term incomplete coursework submitted by your instructor(s) and/or have a RISD instructor(s) submit your spring 2023 grade to the Office of the Registrar should you need the grade(s) to complete your degree requir





28 Sun May 




Commencement
